College_Summary: Nagaland University offers several undergraduate, postgraduate and Ph.D. programmes in different fields. Arts, Science, Commerce, Agricultural Sciences, Engineering & Technology and Management streams are some of the programmes offered by the University.

College_Name: National Research Centre on Mithun - [NRCM], Dimapur

College_Summary: NIT Nagaland is ranked 201 for BTech by NIRF 2022. NIT Nagaland is an autonoous university and offers BTech, MTech, MSc and PhD degrees. NIT Nagaland offers courses in technology and science discipline. NIT Nagaland is fully funded by MHRD, Government of India. NIT Nagaland is situated in Chumukedima, Dimapur, Nagaland. NIT Nagaland provides hostel facilities for its students.

St. Joseph University was established in 2016 under govt. act. no. 6. It is a private, catholic research university run by DMI (Daughter of Mary Immaculate) sisters and MMI (Missionaries of Mary Immaculate) fathers with a genuine aim of providing education to the people of Nagaland. The university is recognised by UGC (University Grants Commission) and approved by AICTE (All India Council for Technical Education).

Institute of Chartered Financial Analysts of India, commonly known as ICFAI University, is highly considered as platform for creativity, professional ethics, Life Skills for students in Nagaland. It is located in the heart of Dimapur a developing town of Nagaland which holds the future for the research based companies.It offers high quality education at PG and UG courses in Management and computer application courses.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Airlines, Tourism & Hospitality Management

College_Summary: Immanuel College (IC) was established in the year of 1994 along with an aim of providing quality education to the students besides preparing them academically both in Science and Arts streams. It is a full-fledged college which is recognized by the University Grant Commission (UGC) and is affiliated by the Nagaland University. The college is located in a residential area at Lingrijan, Dimarpur, Nagaland which is 3 Kms away from the railway station and 10 kms away from the airport. The main objective of the college is to develop a notable personality with excellent character and culture to face the challenges of the modern world.

College_Name: St. Joseph' s College, Kohima, Nagaland
College_Summary: St. Joseph’s College Kohima is an autonomous College located in the Jakhama metropolitan area of Kohima. It’s a Catholic Institution started by the Catholic Church Nagaland. St. Joseph’s College is managed by the Diocese of Kohima, Nagaland.

College_Name: Nagaland College of Teacher Education, Kohima

College_Summary: Founded in 2006, the Global Open University is a distance learning university located in Dimapur, Nagaland. It provides vocational, job oriented and employment-centric education in the North-Eastern part of the nation. The university offers graduate and post-graduate courses in arts, science and commerce domains. At UG level, the courses include BA, B.Sc, B.Com, Bachelor of Hotel Management Travel and Tourism, BCA, Bachelor of Social Work, B.Lib and BBA whereas in PG level it offers MA, M.Sc, M.Com, M.Lib, MCA, MBA, LL.M, Master of Social Work, Master of Hospital Management, Master of Public Health, Master of Business Law degree courses.

Government Polytechnic Kohima is located on a hillock which is 5 km away from the main city with a panoramic view of the capital city, Kohima. It was established in 1994 and initially, the institute used to cater only to girls but was later made co-educational. It is currently functioning under the aegis of the State Council for Technical Education (SCTE) and is approved by AICTE, New Delhi.

College_Name: Institute of Communication and Information Technology, Kohima

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Vocational Studies [B.Voc.] (Retail Management & Information Technology)

College_Name: Shri Digamber Jain Girls' College, Dimapur

College_Summary: Sazolie College, Kohima, established in 2005, is affiliated to Nagaland University and accredited by NAAC and UGC. The college offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Humanities. Admission in the Sazolie College is done on the merit basis of the marks scored in the previous qualifying examination. Furthermore, the college has qualified and experienced faculty members having rich industry and academic institutions experience. Apart from that, the college provides various facilities that help the students in their studies.

College_Name: North East Institute of Social Science & Research, Dimapur

College_Summary: KROS college, Kohima is a private college affiliated to Nagaland University. The college has been offering undergraduate courses in the discipline of Arts since the academic year of 2010-11. One of the most notable things about the college is its faculty which consists of highly qualified professors who have passed from some of the most prestigious universities of India. The admission to the college can be done through online as well as offline mode and the selection is based purely on merit.

College_Name: Capital College of Higher Education - [CCHE], Kohima

College_Summary: St John College, Dimapur, established in 2006, is one of the most successful private Christian co-ed colleges. It is affiliated to Nagaland University and approved by UGC and NAAC. It offers 3 year degree programmes in Arts (B.A.) and Science (B.Sc.) streams. Admission to SJC depends on the performance of the candidates in their last qualifying examination. The faculty at the college are highly qualified and well experienced.

St. Joseph University, Dimapur is a private university established in 2016 under Nagaland Government Act No. 6 of 2016. It is approved and recognized by UGC and AICTE. The university offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma, research programs in the discipline of Humanities, Computer Application, Engineering, Commerce, Management, and Science.

College_Name: Nagaland Institute of Medical Sciences and Research - [NIMSR], Kohima
